result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for handling cryptographic functions, specifically loading certificates from PKCS#12 and .p8 formats.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating cryptographic functionalities in a dedicated package.

pkg/crypto/key.go.purpose: This file provides functions to load certificates from PKCS#12 and .p8 formats.
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information if errors are not handled properly.
